name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary: As a Senior Network Engineer, I bring a strong expertise in networking technologies including **Cisco**, **HPE**, **Aruba**, **Dell**, **EMC**, and **Extreme**. My proficiency in **LAN**, **WLAN**, network virtualization, automation, and security ensures the delivery of highly reliable network solutions. With a solid focus on network segmentation and Network Access Control (NAC), I am dedicated to maintaining robust security and compliance in all networking initiatives. I excel in fostering customer orientation and effective teamwork, utilizing strong communication skills in both **German** and **English**. Beyond networking, I have 8 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer with a tech stack that includes **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and cloud platforms like **Azure** and **AWS**. My background includes leading the development of enterprise-grade solutions with a focus on AI/ML capabilities and the integration of microservices architecture alongside CI/CD automation, ensuring high-performance and secure applications.
